DOC.brief_summary: Although express breast milk consider optimal nutritional source preterm infant , macronutrient content insufficient enable optimal growth neonatal intensive care . Optimal dose optimal mode administration ( standardized individualize ) enteral protein supplementation preterm infant establish . This study aim compare effect weight gain different mode enteral protein supplementation .
DOC.criteria: preterm infant < 32 week gestation < 1500g birth weight > 100ml/kg/d enteral feed miss informed consent decision fee breast milk congenital malformation age > 7 day study entry
